channel.title: Friends list
channel.description:
Well on my server it is a problem and I have had heaps of complaints about it and im not sure how to fix it.
If the player is offline it shows that they are offline, and if they are online it shows they are online. But they can still send messages.
Also if u send a message to an offline player it still sends it if they are offline or not.
And it never shows if they are online[

item.dc:creator: @yobytruk yobytruk
item.description:
@yobytruk wrote:

[quote=“Dopple™, post:3, topic:286396”][quote author=yobytruk link=topic=378760.msg2848799#msg2848799 date=1246416314]
Well on my server it is a problem and I have had heaps of complaints about it and im not sure how to fix it.

If the player is offline it shows that they are offline, and if they are online it shows they are online. But they can still send messages.

Also if u send a message to an offline player it still sends it if they are offline or not.

And it never shows if they are online[
[/quote]
Look through the method[/quote]

Sorry dude, I can code, just but I don’t know about this fl thing. Can you explain it a bit more.

b b0yz 4:

What?!

I know I repeated myself but. basically, if someone is online it shows they are offline. But you can still PM them

Read full topic
